DreamersDream.DreamDef.label: Dreamt about murdering rival
DreamersDream.DreamDef.description: I wish they could still be here. To see how much I'm enjoying myself now, after ending their miserable life...

DreamersDream.DreamDef.label: Dreamt about murder spree
DreamersDream.DreamDef.description: Nothing can stop me. Murder. Everyone.

DreamersDream.DreamDef.label: Dreamt about torturing
DreamersDream.DreamDef.description: Stranger tied up in front of me. Set of shiny and sharp tools on the table. I grabbed one of the knifes and I couldn't stop. Even when strangers body stopped quivering, I was still taking pleasure in the simple act of torture...

DreamersDream.DreamDef.label: Dreamt about murder
DreamersDream.DreamDef.description: Motionless body lays in front of me and I watch it. The blood pool keeps getting bigger. I don't remember why I killed this person but it feels so damn good.

DreamersDream.DreamDef.label: Dreamt about fighting
DreamersDream.DreamDef.description: Breaking their bones is not enough! Let the blood spill!

DreamersDream.DreamDef.label: Dreamt about partying naked
DreamersDream.DreamDef.description: I was walking around the colony, when I realised that I'm wearing no clothes! I looked around and noticed that everyone took off their clothes as they saw me! We started to drink and dance naked until we dropped from exhaustion.

DreamersDream.DreamDef.label: Dreamt about human feast
DreamersDream.DreamDef.description: Legs, arms, eyes and brains. Cooked to perfection. I can eat my fill and no one will judge me!

DreamersDream.DreamDef.label: Dreamt about eating my rival
DreamersDream.DreamDef.description: I laughed while tying him over the fire pit. I laughed while heat was charring his face. I laughed while consuming his flesh.

DreamersDream.DreamDef.label: Dreamt about eating someone
DreamersDream.DreamDef.description: Eating a human being is simple. I used to think of it as a disgusting thing, but simply trying this delicacy proved me wrong!

DreamersDream.DreamDef.label: Dreamt about special pizza
DreamersDream.DreamDef.description: I dreamt I was making pizza out of my friends. It was delicious.
